item.title: AI-Based Quality Control & Defect Detection Using Computer Vision in Manufacturing
item.description: A practical guide to defect detection using YOLOv8 and synthetic data generation with OpenCV for industrial quality control.

item.title: Feature Detection, Part 3: Harris Corner Detection
item.description: Finding the most informative points in images using Harris Corner Detection, a fundamental technique for industrial inspection.

item.title: How to Improve the Performance of Visual Anomaly Detection Models
item.description: Apply the best methods from academia to get the most out of practical applications of visual anomaly detection.

item.title: The Next AI Revolution: A Tutorial Using VAEs to Generate High-Quality Synthetic Data
item.description: Tutorial on leveraging the BasicVAE architecture to generate synthetic data and improve classification accuracy.

item.title: YOLOv1 Paper Walkthrough: The Day YOLO First Saw the World
item.description: A detailed walkthrough of the YOLOv1 architecture and its PyTorch implementation from scratch.

item.title: Feature Detection, Part 1: Image Derivatives, Gradients, and Sobel Operator
item.description: Applying calculus fundamentals to computer vision for edge detection with OpenCV and Sobel operator.

item.title: Auto-Encoder: What Is It? And What Is It Used For? (Part 1)
item.description: A Gentle Introduction to Auto-Encoder and Some Of Its Common Use Cases With Python Code.
